/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApAgnApntRDao.selectApAgnApntR */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.USER_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) USER_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.AGNT_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) AGNT_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = M.AGNT_RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) AGNT_RESC_NM,
FROM (
SELECT
* FROM (SELECT N.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT
T.USER_UID, T.AGNT_UID, T.AGNT_RESC_ID, T.SORT_ORDR,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.USER_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) USER_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.AGNT_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) AGNT_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = T.AGNT_RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) AGNT_RESC_NM,
FROM AP_AGN_APNT_R T
AND T.USER_UID = #{userUid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.AGNT_UID = #{agntUid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.USER_UID, T.AGNT_UID
) N WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
